pkgmetadata.longdescription: This package 66-tools is a set of helper tools used mainly in sys-apps/66 spervision suite. It is optional for 66 itself, but most of 66's frontends *require* it for the convenience it provides.

use.flag: Relevant only if USE=dbus else dbus-related packages not pulled; For sd-bus library in sys-auth/elogind. Disabling this will pull sys-libs/basu
Depending on useflag "elogind" pulls either sys-auth/elogind or sys-libs/basu
